business.headline: 90-hour workweek: What India Inc thinks of L&T chief's suggestionL&T Chairman SN Subrahmanyan recently expressed regret over not being able to make employees work on Sundays, suggesting that a 90-hour workweek is key to success.

Explained: Why Infosys has filed counter lawsuit against CognizantInfosys vs Cognizant legal battle: The Bengaluru-based firm accused its US-based rival of contractually restricting clients from awarding IT services to competitors and withholding software training, which Infosys claims hindered its ability to compete.

Supreme Court gives big relief for online gaming sector. Details hereThe Supreme Court has stayed Rs 1.12 lakh crore GST notices against online gaming firms, with a final hearing scheduled for March 18, 2025.

Industry leaders call for up to 90-hour workweek. Are they willing to pay more? L&T Chairman SN Subrahmanyan made waves by suggesting employees should work on Sundays. Last year, Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy proposed that millennials work 70-hour weeks to improve India's productivity.
Budget 2025: Don't expect these tax changesBudget 2025 is likely to prioritise fiscal discipline, minor tax tweaks, and cautious consumption boosts over bold reforms.

Rupee hits all-time low, nears 86 mark against US dollarRupee hits all-time: Closing at 85.9650, the rupee marked its tenth consecutive weekly loss, slipping 0.2% this week amid a strong dollar and persistent capital outflows.
Sensex, Nifty close lower amid earnings concerns; TCS gains 6% The S&P BSE Sensex lost 241.30 points to end at 77,378.91, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 95 points to end at 23,431.50.

Explained: Why IRCTC share price jumped up to 5% todayIRCTC share price: The stock rose nearly 5% to hit a day's high of Rs 800.65 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), compared to the previous close of Rs 763.50.
Blinkit launches Bistro app for 10-minute food deliveryBlinkit's Bistro delivers canteen-style food in 10 minutes, rivalling Swiggy's Snacc and Zepto Cafe.

Paytm sees strong institutional growth: Mutual fund stake surges by 3.3%, total holdings up 4%Paytm's progress toward achieving EBITDA before ESOP breakeven by Q4 FY2025 further reinforces its strong fundamentals and appeal to institutional investors.

Budget 2025: Looking back at tax relief measures for senior citizens in 2024Senior citizens seek tax relief and reforms in Budget 2025 to tackle inflation, income challenges and enhance their qulity of life.
GST return filing delayed. Deadline extension expectedGST return filing faces delays due to GSTN portal glitches, with a potential deadline extension expected to ease compliance challenges.

L&T chairman earned 534.57 times median salary of peers in FY24. Check detailsLarsen & Toubro (L&T) Chairman SN Subrahmanyan's remarks on the 90-hour workweek have been a topic of debate. Amid all this, his salary for FY24 has attracted eyeballs, which is 534.57 times the median salary of peers.
How to link and use your credit card for UPI transactions. A simple guideUPI integration with credit cards simplifies payments offering instant, secure, and contactless transactions.

Sensex, Nifty in volatile territory: What should stock market investors do? Stock market today: Sensex and Nifty rebounded on IT gains, but volatility persists amid FII outflows and global uncertainty. Here's what's driving the market and how investors should tackle it.

Budget 2025: What is joint taxation for married couples?The ICAI's Budget 2025 proposal for joint taxation of married couples aims to ease financial stress, boost compliance, and modernise India's tax system with higher exemptions and flexible slabs.

Tata Elxsi share price down 8%. Why did it hit 52-week low after Q3 results?Tata Elxsi stock price: At 10:40 a.m., Tata Elxsi's share price was down 7% at Rs 5992.95. In early trade, the stock hit a 52-week low of Rs 5,924.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Infra development in J&K unrelated to Article 370 scrapping: Omar AbdullahSpeaking to India Today TV, Chief Minister Omar Abdullah said that completion of infrastructure projects in Jammu and Kashmir has no connection to abrogation of Article 370, adding that they were bound to happen.

Made traitors like him sit at home: Amit Shah's fiery attack on Uddhav ThackerayUnion Home Minister Amit Shah launched a blistering attack on Shiv Sena (UBT) chief Uddhav Thackeray during the BJP's state executive meeting in Shirdi. He criticised Uddhav Thackeray for aligning with the Opposition for the Maharashtra Assembly polls.

BJP MLA replaced by Kapil Mishra in Karawal Nagar fielded from another Delhi seatFive-time BJP MLA Mohan Singh Bisht, who currently represents the Karawal Nagar seat, has been replaced by Kapil Mishra for the upcoming Delhi Assembly elections.

Trudeau ex-ally Jagmeet Singh on Trump's Canada threat: Ready to fight like hellCanadian MP Jagmeet Singh denounced US President-elect Donald Trump's repeated remarks about Canada becoming America's "51st state."

Working over 48 hours a week? What Indian labour laws say about your work weekMany Indian youth regularly move to big cities in the hope of success, fame, and earning money. And despite the fact that India's labour laws limit work to 48 hours a week, many companies tend to exploit starry-eyed young employees by making them work overtime and often, with low pay.

Train carrying passengers for Maha Kumbh pelted with stones in MaharashtraThe attack occurred two to three kilometres after the train left the Jalgaon station, causing damage to the windows of the B6 coach.

Steve Jobs's wife, in India for Maha Kumbh 2025, gets Hindu name 'Kamala'Ahead of her visit to the Maha Kumbh 2025, Laurene Powell Jobs, the wife of late Apple co-founder Steve Jobs, visited Varanasi's Kashi Vishwanath Temple and was given the Hindu name of 'Kamala'.

Arvind Kejriwal called, sought support for AAP for polls, claims Hanuman BeniwalRashtriya Loktantrik Party (RLP) chief MP Hanuman Beniwal said that AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal called him and sought support for AAP for the Delhi elections, adding that he will campaign for the ruling party for the upcoming polls.

Sunday is here and so are the 'stare at wife' memes. Of course, you know whyAs Sunday arrived, social media users flooded X with 'stare at wife' memes and jokes. Of course, you know why. Best ones here.

Man hires hitmen to kill girlfriend's father, they kill wrong person instead Lawyer Aaftab Ahmed, the prime accused, allegedly hired hitmen to eliminate the father and husband of the woman he was in a relationship with. However, in a mix-up, the hired killers shot Mohammad Rizwan instead of the intended target.

Bangladesh official meets Indian envoy, shares 'deep concern' on border tensionsThe development came hours after Dhaka alleged that India was trying to construct fences at five locations along the India-Bangladesh border, violating a bilateral agreement.

Sukesh Chandrasekhar wants to pay Rs 7,640 crore tax, writes to Nirmala SitharamanIn his letter to Nirmala Sitharaman, Sukesh Chandrasekhar, claimed a whopping Rs 22,410 crore overseas income in 2024-25 and even offered to pay Rs 7,640 crore in taxes.

Telephone anxiety is real, and this UK college even has a course to tackle itNottingham College in the UK addresses telephonophobia by coaching students in phone skills, helping them overcome their fear of making or answering calls.

The auction saw top players like Rishabh Pant breaking records with massive bids.

Students seen cleaning school toilets in viral video, principal suspendedA viral video showing girl students cleaning toilets at a government school in Tamil Nadu's Palakkodu led to the suspension of the principal, pending an official investigation.

Pickleball serves new business idea, merges passion with profitsThe pickleball rage in India has taken a new turn. The US-born game, which entered the sports scene in India just four years ago, has opened up a new investment option, promising big returns. Players are now putting in money as passion is meeting profits.

Kolkata Metro links Howrah, Sealdah stations; travel time to reduce to 11 minutesKolkata Metro's Green Line will connect Howrah and Sealdah, reducing travel time between the two stations to just 11 minutes soon.

Blinkit delivery agent supplies cigarettes to underage students in Kota, arrestedA 48-year-old Blinkit delivery agent was arrested on charges of supplying cigarettes to underage coaching students in Rajasthan's Kota. Police said it would file a chargesheet against the quick e-commerce platform.

Took my pistol and went to Kapil Dev's house to kill him: Yograj SinghYuvraj Singh's father Yograj has revealed that he went to Kapil Dev's house to kill him. Yograj said that he took out his pistol wanting to put a bullet through Kapil's head.

Ajith kisses wife Shalini after Dubai race win, celebs congratulate himAjith Kumar secured third place at the Dubai 24H racing event on Sunday, celebrating the achievement with his family in the pit lane. Following his win, celebrities like R Madhavan and Sivakarthikeyan extended their heartfelt congratulations.

Court directs police to protect inter-caste couple amid opposition from familyThe Bombay High Court's directive came after a woman, who was forcibly taken to Uttar Pradesh by her family, expressed her desire to reunite with her husband.

Fraudsters swap QR codes outside shops to get payments into their accountsFraudsters in Madhya Pradesh's Chhatarpur replaced QR codes at shops overnight, diverting payments to their accounts. The crime, caught on CCTV, is under investigation.

Not a contender for any post: Ramesh Bidhuri counters Arvind Kejriwal's claimDelhi BJP leader Ramesh Bidhuri refuted former Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal's claim that he is the party's chief ministerial candidate for the upcoming Assembly elections.

Actor Tiku Talsania's daughter shares his health update: He's much better nowVeteran Bollywood actor Tiku Talsania was hospitalised after suffering a heart attack on January 11. On Sunday, his daughter, Shikha Talsania, shared updates on his health.

Ananya Panday enjoys friend's wedding with Janhvi Kapoor-Shikhar PahariyaAnanya Panday, Janhvi Kapoor, and Shikhar Pahariya recently attended a friend's wedding in Delhi. On Sunday, the Call Me Bae actor shared a previously unseen glimpse of the intimate celebration.

Miley Cyrus's 'aching' note for wildfire victims after losing home in 2018Miley Cyrus shared an emotional message for those affected by the recent California wildfires, recalling her own experience of losing her home in a similar disaster in 2018.

Nayanthara-Vignesh spread joy at event in Madurai: This love is enoughNayanthara and Vignesh Shivan recently attended an event in Madurai. Dressed in elegant traditional attire, the couple radiated joy as they interacted with fans and posed for pictures.

sports.headline: FA Cup: 10-man Manchester United, Bayindir dump Arsenal out on penaltiesAltay Bayindir was the star of the show as 10-man Manchester United defeated Arsenal 5-3 on penalties to dump them out of the FA Cup in the third round on Sunday, January 12. United fought bravely for most of the game as Diogo Dalot was given a red card.

Pakistan will have upper hand over India in Champions Trophy 2025: Mohammad AmirFormer Pakistan fast bowler Mohammad Amir feels Pakistan will have an upper hand over India in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 due to their recent form.

Watch: Aryna Sabalenka recreates viral TikTok dance with Melbourne crowdAryna Sabalenka recreated one of her viral TikTok videos with the Melbourne crowd after her first round win in the Australian Open 2025 on Sunday, January 12. Sabalenka defeated Sloanne Stephens in straight sets to make it to the second round.

IPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer to lead Punjab Kings as franchise aims to end barren runPunjab Kings announced India batter Shreyas Iyer as their captain for the Indian Premier League 2025(IPL 2025). Punjab bought Iyer for a whopping Rs 26.75 Crore during the mega auction.

Devajit Saikia delighted to carry forward work done by Jay Shah as BCCI SecretaryThe newly elected BCCI Secretary Devajit Saikia said that he's delighted to carry forward the work done by his predecessor Jay Shah.

PD Champions Trophy: Indian Physical Disability Team beat Pakistan by 109 runsNikhil Manhas was the star of the show as the Indian physical disability team defeated Pakistan by 109 runs on Sunday, January 12. India posted 160 runs in their 19 overs as Pakistan's chase faltered in just 12.2 overs.

Australian Open: Alexander Zverev breezes past Lucas Pouille to reach Round 2Alexander Zverev made light work of wildcard Lucas Pouille to reach the second round of the Australian Open 2025 on Sunday, January 12. Zverev defeated Pouille in straight sets to make it to the next round in Melbourne.

Afghanistan announce squad for Champions Trophy, Ghazanfar to play maiden ICC eventAfghanistan Cricket Board (ACB) have announced a 15-member squad for the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. AM Ghazanfar is all set to play his maiden ICC tournament while Mujeeb ur Rahman has missed out on selection.

WPL 2025 to be hosted in Mumbai, Vadodara, Lucknow and Bengaluru: Rajeev ShuklaThe WPL 2025 will be held across 4 cities, BCCI vice-president Rajeev Shukla confirmed on Sunday, January 12. Mumbai, Lucknow, Bengaluru and Vadodara will act as the venues for the women's franchise league this year.

Neuer confirms Bayern Munich contract extension till 2026: It's trueManuel Neuer, Bayern Munich's legendary goalkeeper, will extend his contract until 2026, adapting to a new role with reduced salary, performance-based incentives, and a mentorship responsibility to prepare his future successor for the club's long-term success.

Casper Ruud survived a 5-set thriller to progress to the second round on Sunday.

6th-seed Casper Ruud survives massive scare in 5-set battle vs Juame MunarAustralian Open nearly served up its first upset on Sunday, 12 January as 6th seed Casper Ruud survived a massive scare in the very first round of the tournament.

Steve Smith expresses desire to play in 2028 Los Angeles OlympicsStar Australia batter Steve Smith has expressed his desire to play in the 2028 Los Angeles Olympic Gmes after smashing a century in Big Bash League 2024-25.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
